text: haey tamkarpit yeung ban banhchoun mou sa cheamuoynung mou chi hsaa t neanea robsa yeung( towkean ambaur aisreael promteang yeung banhchea tha) chaur anak( mou sa) doeknoam krom robsa anak chenhpi pheap ngngut tow rk pheap mean ponlu haey chaur anak romluk puokke nouv thngai ( nie k meat ning tondakamm) robsa a l laoh . pitabrakd nasa nowknong rueng noh chea banda phosdo tang samreab real anak del atthmot anak del doengkoun
